column4: Tesla lagging on Model 3 production  workers say
column5: SAN FRANCISCO Tesla Inc is not producing enough Model 3s per shift to reach the 5 000 per week target that Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk said it would reach by Saturday  three line workers at the company's Fremont  California  assembly plant told Reuters this week. | Video

column4: Qualcomm extends NXP tender offer yet again
column5: U.S. chipmaker Qualcomm Inc  on Friday extended the tender offer for its proposed $44 billion deal to buy NXP Semiconductors NV  for the 29th time as it awaits clearance from the Chinese government.

column4: Qualcomm extends NXP tender offer yet again
column5: June 29 U.S. chipmaker Qualcomm Inc on Friday extended the tender offer for its proposed $44 billion deal to buy NXP Semiconductors NV for the 29th time as it awaits clearance from the Chinese government.
